issue.message: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
`temp_cache.db` is not in an included path
Unexpected domain `cache`, expected one of file, database, sharedpref, external, root, device_file, device_database, device_sharedpref, device_root
`.` is not in an included path
`temp_cache.db` is not in an included path
Unexpected domain `cache`, expected one of file, database, sharedpref, external, root, device_file, device_database, device_sharedpref, device_root
`.` is not in an included path
Redundant label can be removed

Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices

Switch statement on an `int` with known associated constant missing case `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_ANNOUNCEMENT`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_ASSIST_READING_CONTEXT`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_GESTURE_DETECTION_END`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_GESTURE_DETECTION_START`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_NOTIFICATION_STATE_CHANGED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_SPEECH_STATE_CHANGE`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_TOUCH_EXPLORATION_GESTURE_END`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_TOUCH_EXPLORATION_GESTURE_START`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_TOUCH_INTERACTION_END`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_TOUCH_INTERACTION_START`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_ACCESSIBILITY_FOCUSED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_ACCESSIBILITY_FOCUS_CLEARED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_CONTEXT_CLICKED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_FOCUSED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_HOVER_ENTER`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_HOVER_EXIT`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_LONG_CLICKED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_SCROLLED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_SELECTED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_TARGETED_BY_SCROLL`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_CHANGED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_SELECTION_CHANGED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_TRAVERSED_AT_MOVEMENT_GRANULARITY`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOWS_CHANGED`, `AccessibilityEvent.TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED`
Should not restrict activity to fixed orientation. This may not be suitable for different form factors, causing the app to be letterboxed.
Using 'Log' instead of 'Timber'
issue.errorLine1: Log.e("FGOBot-Logger", "Failed to write to log file", e)

Assigning `Locale.getDefault()` to a final static field is suspicious; this code will not work correctly if the user changes locale while the app is running
issue.errorLine1: private val dateFormat = SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS", Locale.getDefault())

issue.message: Assigning `Locale.getDefault()` to a final static field is suspicious; this code will not work correctly if the user changes locale while the app is running
